headline: Kroger (KR) Valuation Check After Net Loss, Lower Sales Outlook and Cost-Cutting Moves
summary: Kroger (KR) stock has been under pressure after management paired a headline net loss with a lower sales outlook, warning that pharmacy headwinds and tougher competition could keep sales growth subdued into 2026. See our latest analysis for Kroger. At around $63.38, Kroger’s 1 day share price return has ticked higher, but the negative 7 day and 90 day share price returns show momentum fading as investors digest the net loss, pharmacy headwinds, and fulfillment center closures. Even so, the 5...
